      • login

        public int login(java.lang.String username,
                 java.lang.String pass)
        Logs user into system.
        Parameters:
        username - username associated with this user
        pass - password user uses to log in
        Returns:
        int representation of login attempt. 0 if succesful, 1 if invalid username, 2 if invalid password, and 3 if status is inactive.
